item.title: [Android] The Pawn
item.description: The Pawn The Pawn is an original puzzle game for Android, inspired by chess. You don’t need to know the rules of Chess to play, as it is quite different. Tap to move, one square at a time. Move onto another friend piece to change into it. Change into the king to win. Move onto an enemy piece to knock it out. Each piece has a different move set, indicated by arrows.

item.title: [RG351] 351Files
item.description: 351Files 351Files is a single panel file manager, tailored for Anbernic 351 devices: RG351V and RG351P. It can be easily adapted to any Linux-based device. Based on DinguxCommander. Features Single panel file manager Copy, move, rename, delete, create directories and files. Display file size, compute directory size Text file viewer Text file editor Image viewer (original size or fit screen, next / previous image) Github page : https://github.com/Tardigrade-nx/351Files

item.title: [Android] ComptageRDM
item.description: ComptageRDM ComptageRDM est une application Android dans le domaine des transports en commun. Il s’agit d’un outil de comptage manuel, qui peut être utilisé embarqué à bord d’un bus, ou fixe à un poteau. Il prend en entrée un fichier RDM exporté du logiciel HASTUS via le module Rider, et produit en sortie le même fichier avec les heures d’arrivée, de départ, et le nombre de montées / descentes renseignés.

item.title: [Nintendo Switch] SlitherlinkNX
item.description: SlitherlinkNX Slitherlink is a logic puzzle game created in 1989 by Japanese publisher Nikoli, famous for creating Sudoku, among many other puzzle games. See (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slitherlink) for more info. I discovered the game a few years ago on the Nintendo DS with ‘Puzzle Series Vol. 5: Slitherlink’, which was never released outside of Japan. It’s such a good game I became addicted to it, just like with Picross and Nurikabe. This is my version of the game for the Nintendo Switch.

item.title: [Android] OptimTicketsResto
item.description: OptimTicketsResto OptimTicketsResto est une application Android, pour calculer les tickets restaurant. Exemple ci-dessous : vous disposez de 2 carnets de tickets : un de 9€ avec 3 tickets restants un de 6,50€ avec 20 tickets restants vous devez payer 75,40€ L’application vous donne le nombre de tickets à donner de chaque carnet, pour s’approcher au maximum du prix sans le dépasser, ainsi que le restant, à payer par un autre moyen.

item.title: [Dingoo] DinguxCommander
item.description: DinguxCommander DinguxCommander is a dual-panel file manager for Dingoo A320 (Dingux). Download: DinguxCommander_v2.1.tar.gz Source: DinguxCommander_v2.1_src.tar.gz Features: Copy, move and delete multiple files. View a file Execute a file Rename a file/dir Create a new directory Display disk space used by a list of selected files/dirs Display disk information (used, available) For more information, see file README.txt.

item.title: [PSP] AntiTetris
item.description: AntiTetris A homebrew game for PSP. AntiTetris is a visual reproduction of the Game Boy Tetris, but based on a physics engine. Lines are not implemented. The aim is to stack up as many tetrominoes as possible before they reach the top of the screen. Download: AntiTetris.zip Source: AntiTetris_src.zip Vidéo: http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x61qf5_antitetris-psp-homebrew_videogames Credits: Development: Tardigrade Graphics library: JGE++ Physics engine: Chipmunk

item.title: [Nintendo DS] Everlasting Love
item.description: Everlasting Love Homebrew game for the Nintendo DS. Everlasting Love is a combination of a 2D platformer and a rhythm game, in which you have to adjust your jumps using the music. The song is Everlasting Love from the original soundtrack of We Love Katamari. Download: Everlasting.zip / Everlasting_sc.zip / Everlasting_gba.zip How to play : The monkey can move right and left during jumps only. No walking. As soon as he touches a wall, he holds onto it until the next jump.
